content_nodes.content: As a member, you get more than just a health plan.We deliver top doctors, personalized care, and the services you need.
Our Shop KP retail sales store will be opening in August 2016 in Watsonville. Check back for updates.

maps.title: Watsonville Community Hospital
content: We're also joining with Watsonville Community Hospital* to offer Kaiser Permanente members access to additional emergency services, labor and delivery and other hospital services recommended by your doctor.
Learn more about Watsonville Community Hospital. external page

intro_1.title: Healthy change is coming to San Jose
intro_1.long_Desc: Soon, you'll have even more access to quality primary and specialty, care in your community. We're excited to open a new medical office building in San Jose, making it even easier for you and your family to get the care you need. all under one roof.

intro_2.title: Live, Work, Thrive
intro_2.boldText: Kaiser Permanente is building the future of health in downtown Sacramento
intro_2.long_Desc: Downtown Sacramento is being shaped by more than new building, lively restaurants, and modern shops. It's being transformed by homeowners,entrepreneurs,and other hard-working professionals who keep the city's lights shining.It's being defined by the thousands of fans who fill Golden 1 Center and the neighbors who frequent the local boutiques, museums, and cafes, As the community continues building for the future, Kaiser Permanente is there to make sure it's a healthy one.

new_center.desc: planed in historic Railyards district - set to open in 2024.

sports_center.desc: providing care to athletes of all levels - now open in Golden 1 Center

service_list.desc: 60 provider offices, 95 exam rooms, and 8 procedure rooms
Pharmacy, specimen lab and imaging all under one roof
Register with the certification foal of LEED Platinum for low energy and water use
Across the street from our new Mercury Way Mental Health and Wellness facility

multi_icon.title: Salud en Espanol
multi_icon.long_Desc: At our new medical offices, you will have access to the Salud en Espanol module if you prefer to be treated in your language by primary care doctors, nurses and more. That way you'll feel even more comfortable getting Kaiser Permanentes quality care.

inline_img_text.desc: The state of the art Medical Office building represents Kaiser Permanente's continued commitment to providing convenient, high quality healthcare to our members in their communities. Leveraging our integrated approach and technology. we look forward to providing an exception care experience to our members at this new Southwest Santa Rosa location.
